sentences.en: And he promptly handed the sheet of paper to the gaoler.
sentences.cn: 说完,他一下子把信递给狱卒.

sentences.en: At last, the gaoler fetched the copy written in full and read it to the aristocrat.
sentences.cn: 最后, 狱卒将有文字的信件拿来,念给贵族听.

sentences.en: In the year 1800 the chief constable was a publican, and the head gaoler sold rum and brandy opposite the prison gates.
sentences.cn: 举1800年的例子来说吧：警察局长的第二职业是酒馆老板，总监狱长则在监狱大门的正对面开了个朗姆酒和白兰地的专卖店。

sentences.en: Just then, the gaoler appeared with the precious letter in his bands.
sentences.cn: 这时狱卒上场,手里拿着那封珍贵的信.

sentences.en: Just then, the gaoler appeared with the precious letter in his hands.
sentences.cn: 就在这时, 狱卒手里拿着那珍贵的信出现了.
狱卒用藤条鞭打这个人.

sentences.en: The gaoler couldn't remember a word either. He was very embarrassed.
sentences.cn: 狱卒自己也记不住信的内容,觉得非常尴尬.

sentences.en: The gaoler nodded grimly, laying his withered hand on the shoulder of the miserable Toad.
sentences.cn: 狱卒阴沉地点点头, 把他枯干的手按在不幸的蟾蜍肩上.

sentences.en: The kind gaoler agreed to post the letter for the prisoner.
sentences.cn: 好心的看守答应帮犯人寄信.
